nternalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalUnbackedStablecoin","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"unpause","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"toBeWhitelistedAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"whitelist","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"accrueStabilityFee(bytes32,address,int256)":{"details":"This function can only be called by the StabilityFeeCollector role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It also requires the system to be live.","params":{"_collateralPoolId":"The ID of the collateral pool where the stability fee is being accrued.","_debtAccumulatedRate":"The debt accumulation rate used in the calculation of the stability fee.","_stabilityFeeRecipient":"The address that will receive the accrued stability fee."}},"addCollateral(bytes32,address,int256)":{"details":"Updates the accounting of collateral tokens deposited by a position in the specified collateral pool.Although the second argument is named as _usr, addCollateral is more often used in the context of CDP manipulation, and the _usr address often represents the position's address. Refer to deposit function in CollateralTokenAdapter.Emits a LogAddCollateral event to record the change in the position's collateral amount.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of collateral being added (positive value) or removed (negative value) from the user's position.","_collateralPoolId":"The ID of the collateral pool in which the position's collateral is being updated.","_usr":"The address of the position for which collateral is being adjusted."}},"adjustPosition(bytes32,address,address,address,int256,int256)":{"details":"This function can only be called by an entity with the Position Manager role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused and the collateral pool is active.It ensures multiple conditions are met regarding debt and collateral values to maintain system stability and safety.","params":{"_collateralOwner":"The address of the owner of the collateral. (positionAddress)","_collateralPoolId":"The ID of the collateral pool where the position is located.","_collateralValue":"The change in collateral value. This is added to the position's current locked collateral.","_debtShare":"The change in debt share. This is added to the position's current debt share.","_positionAddress":"The address of the position to be adjusted.","_stablecoinOwner":"The address of the owner of the stablecoin. (positionAddress)"}},"blacklist(address)":{"details":"Revokes the allowance from the `toBeBlacklistedAddress` to adjust the position address of the caller.Emits no events.","params":{"toBeBlacklistedAddress":"The address that is no longer allowed to adjust the position address of the caller."}},"confiscatePosition(bytes32,address,address,address,int256,int256)":{"details":"This function can only be called by an entity with the Liquidation Engine role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.The seized collateral will be transferred to the Auctioneer contracts and later moved to the corresponding liquidator addresses.The stablecoin debt will be initially marked in the SystemDebtEngine contract and will be cleared later on from a successful liquidation. If the debt is not fully liquidated, the remaining debt will stay inside SystemDebtEngine as bad debt.","params":{"_collateralAmount":"The amount of collateral being confiscated from the position.","_collateralCreditor":"The address where confiscated collateral will be transferred.","_collateralPoolId":"The ID of the collateral pool where the positions are located.","_debtShare":"The amount of debt share being confiscated from the position.","_positionAddress":"The address of the position from which collateral and debt are being confiscated.","_stablecoinDebtor":"The address from which the stablecoin debt is being confiscated."}},"mintUnbackedStablecoin(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function can only be called by the Mintable role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It also requires the system to be live.","params":{"_from":"The address from which the unbacked stablecoin is being minted.","_to":"The address to which the unbacked stablecoin is being minted.","_value":"The amount of unbacked stablecoin to mint."}},"moveCollateral(bytes32,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function can only be called by an entity with the Collateral Manager role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It also requires that the entity making the call has the authority to adjust the position (or any address that holds collateralToken), as determined by `_requireAllowedPositionAdjustment`.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of collateral tokens being moved from the source to the destination.","_collateralPoolId":"The ID of the collateral pool from which the collateral tokens are being moved.","_dst":"The address to which collateral tokens are being moved.","_src":"The address from which collateral tokens are being moved."}},"movePosition(bytes32,address,address,int256,int256)":{"details":"This function can only be called by an entity with the Position Manager role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It ensures that the caller is allowed to manipulate both source and destination positions and the positions remain safe after the move.","params":{"_collateralAmount":"The amount of collateral being moved from the source to the destination position.","_collateralPoolId":"The ID of the collateral pool where the positions are located.","_debtShare":"The amount of debt share being moved from the source to the destination position.","_dst":"The address of the destination position to which collateral and debt are being moved.","_src":"The address of the source position from which collateral and debt are being moved."}},"moveStablecoin(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function can only be called when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It also requires that the entity making the call is allowed to adjust the position (or any address that holds stablecoin) according to `_requireAllowedPositionAdjustment`.","params":{"_dst":"The destination address to which the stablecoin is being moved.","_src":"The source address from which the stablecoin is being moved.","_value":"The amount of stablecoin being moved from the source to the destination."}},"pause()":{"details":"access: OWNER_ROLE, GOV_ROLE"},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"settleSystemBadDebt(uint256)":{"details":"This function can only be called by the SystemDebtEngine, which incurs the system debt. The BookKeeper contract must not be paused.To execute this function, the SystemDebtEngine must have enough stablecoin, which typically comes from the protocol's surplus.A successful execution of this function removes the bad debt from the system.","params":{"_value":"The amount of bad debt to be settled."}},"unpause()":{"details":"access: OWNER_ROLE, GOV_ROLE"},"whitelist(address)":{"details":"Grants an allowance to the `toBeWhitelistedAddress` to adjust the position address of the caller.Emits no events.","params":{"toBeWhitelistedAddress":"The address that is granted permission to adjust the position address of the caller."}}},"stateVariables":{"positionWhitelist":{"details":"This is the mapping which stores the consent or allowance to adjust positions by the position addresses.The position address -> The allowance delegate address -> true (1) means allowed or false (0) means not allowed"}},"title":"BookKeeper","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"accrueStabilityFee(bytes32,address,int256)":{"notice":"Accrue stability fee for a specific collateral pool."},"addCollateral(bytes32,address,int256)":{"notice":"This function can only be called by the Adapter role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused."},"adjustPosition(bytes32,address,address,address,int256,int256)":{"notice":"Adjusts the collateral and debt of a position in a specific collateral pool."},"blacklist(address)":{"notice":"This function can only be called when the BookKeeper contract is not paused."},"confiscatePosition(bytes32,address,address,address,int256,int256)":{"notice":"Confiscates a position for liquidation. It seizes collateral and marks a debt."},"mintUnbackedStablecoin(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Mints unbacked stablecoin."},"moveCollateral(bytes32,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Moves collateral tokens from one address (often a position address) to another in a specified collateral pool."},"movePosition(bytes32,address,address,int256,int256)":{"notice":"Moves collateral and debt from one position to another in a specific collateral pool."},"moveStablecoin(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Moves stablecoin from one address to another."},"settleSystemBadDebt(uint256)":{"notice":"Settles the system's bad debt of the caller."},"whitelist(address)":{"notice":"This function can only be called when the BookKeeper contract is not paused."}},"notice":"A contract which acts as a bookkeeper of the Fathom Stablecoin protocol. It has the ability to move collateral tokens and stablecoins within the accounting state variable.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/main/stablecoin-core/BookKeeper.sol":"BookKeeper"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/access/IAccessControlUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb8f5302f12138c5561362e88a78d061573e6298b7a1a5afe84a1e2c8d4d5aeaa","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://740cf4dc535e3082560cf5a031473029f322690fc8037fe9d5e3a8bef42e757c","dweb:/ipfs/QmTQxFdfxcaueQa23VX34wAPqzruZbkzyeN58tZK2yav2b"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/proxy/utils/Initializable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x89be10e757d242e9b18d5a32c9fbe2019f6d63052bbe46397a430a1d60d7f794","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f103ee2e4aecd37aac6ceefe670709cdd7613dee25fa2d4d9feaf7fc0aaa155e","dweb:/ipfs/QmRiNZLoJk5k3HPMYGPGjZFd2ke1ZxjhJZkM45Ec9GH9hv"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/security/PausableUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x40c636b4572ff5f1dc50cf22097e93c0723ee14eff87e99ac2b02636eeca1250","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9c7d1f5e15633ab912b74c2f57e24559e66b03232300d4b27ff0f25bc452ecad","dweb:/ipfs/QmYTJkc1cntYkKQ1Tu11nBcJLakiy93Tjytc4XHELo4GmR"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/security/ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb82ef33f43b6b96109687d91b39c94573fdccaaa423fe28e8ba0977b31c023e0","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ec9c629f63e66379f9c868a74f971064701cc6e30583872aa653f8b932518025","dweb:/ipfs/QmY4MnZF2VMFwJkAwpdQwxEWA3KcGbNBKEmAVYePMVQWUR"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/utils/AddressUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9c80f545915582e63fe206c6ce27cbe85a86fc10b9cd2a0e8c9488fb7c2ee422","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://310136ad60820af4177a11a61d77a3686faf5fca4942b600e08fc940db38396b","dweb:/ipfs/QmbCzMNSTL7Zi7M4UCSqBrkHtp4jjxUnGbkneCZKdR1qeq"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/utils/ContextUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x963ea7f0b48b032eef72fe3a7582edf78408d6f834115b9feadd673a4d5bd1 deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev This is the mapping which stores the consent or allowance to adjust positions by the position addresses.
 @dev The position address -> The allowance delegate address -> true (1) means allowed or false (0) means not allowed

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32) view external returns (struct ICollateralPoolConfig.CollateralPoolInfo memory)
mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
function (bytes32) view external returns (struct ICollateralPoolConfig.CollateralPoolInfo memory)
mapping(bytes32 => mapping(address => struct BookKeeper.Position storage ref))
function (bytes32) view external returns (struct ICollateralPoolConfig.CollateralPoolInfo memory)
function (bytes32) view external returns (struct ICollateralPoolConfig.CollateralPoolInfo memory)

accrueStabilityFee(bytes32,address,int25.details: This function can only be called by the StabilityFeeCollector role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It also requires the system to be live.

params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool where the stability fee is being accrued.
params._debtAccumulatedRate: The debt accumulation rate used in the calculation of the stability fee.
params._stabilityFeeRecipient: The address that will receive the accrued stability fee.

addCollateral(bytes32,address,int256).details: Updates the accounting of collateral tokens deposited by a position in the specified collateral pool.Although the second argument is named as _usr, addCollateral is more often used in the context of CDP manipulation, and the _usr address often represents the position's address. Refer to deposit function in CollateralTokenAdapter.Emits a LogAddCollateral event to record the change in the position's collateral amount.

params._amount: The amount of collateral being added (positive value) or removed (negative value) from the user's position.
params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool in which the position's collateral is being updated.
params._usr: The address of the position for which collateral is being adjusted.

adjustPosition(bytes32,address,address,a.details: This function can only be called by an entity with the Position Manager role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused and the collateral pool is active.It ensures multiple conditions are met regarding debt and collateral values to maintain system stability and safety.

params._collateralOwner: The address of the owner of the collateral. (positionAddress)
params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool where the position is located.
params._collateralValue: The change in collateral value. This is added to the position's current locked collateral.
params._debtShare: The change in debt share. This is added to the position's current debt share.
params._positionAddress: The address of the position to be adjusted.
params._stablecoinOwner: The address of the owner of the stablecoin. (positionAddress)

blacklist(address).details: Revokes the allowance from the `toBeBlacklistedAddress` to adjust the position address of the caller.Emits no events.

params.toBeBlacklistedAddress: The address that is no longer allowed to adjust the position address of the caller.

confiscatePosition(bytes32,address,addre.details: This function can only be called by an entity with the Liquidation Engine role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.The seized collateral will be transferred to the Auctioneer contracts and later moved to the corresponding liquidator addresses.The stablecoin debt will be initially marked in the SystemDebtEngine contract and will be cleared later on from a successful liquidation. If the debt is not fully liquidated, the remaining debt will stay inside SystemDebtEngine as bad debt.

params._collateralAmount: The amount of collateral being confiscated from the position.
params._collateralCreditor: The address where confiscated collateral will be transferred.
params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool where the positions are located.
params._debtShare: The amount of debt share being confiscated from the position.
params._positionAddress: The address of the position from which collateral and debt are being confiscated.
params._stablecoinDebtor: The address from which the stablecoin debt is being confiscated.

mintUnbackedStablecoin(address,address,u.details: This function can only be called by the Mintable role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It also requires the system to be live.

params._from: The address from which the unbacked stablecoin is being minted.
params._to: The address to which the unbacked stablecoin is being minted.
params._value: The amount of unbacked stablecoin to mint.

moveCollateral(bytes32,address,address,u.details: This function can only be called by an entity with the Collateral Manager role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It also requires that the entity making the call has the authority to adjust the position (or any address that holds collateralToken), as determined by `_requireAllowedPositionAdjustment`.

params._amount: The amount of collateral tokens being moved from the source to the destination.
params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool from which the collateral tokens are being moved.
params._dst: The address to which collateral tokens are being moved.
params._src: The address from which collateral tokens are being moved.

movePosition(bytes32,address,address,int.details: This function can only be called by an entity with the Position Manager role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It ensures that the caller is allowed to manipulate both source and destination positions and the positions remain safe after the move.

params._collateralAmount: The amount of collateral being moved from the source to the destination position.
params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool where the positions are located.
params._debtShare: The amount of debt share being moved from the source to the destination position.
params._dst: The address of the destination position to which collateral and debt are being moved.
params._src: The address of the source position from which collateral and debt are being moved.

moveStablecoin(address,address,uint256).details: This function can only be called when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.It also requires that the entity making the call is allowed to adjust the position (or any address that holds stablecoin) according to `_requireAllowedPositionAdjustment`.

params._dst: The destination address to which the stablecoin is being moved.
params._src: The source address from which the stablecoin is being moved.
params._value: The amount of stablecoin being moved from the source to the destination.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

settleSystemBadDebt(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the SystemDebtEngine, which incurs the system debt. The BookKeeper contract must not be paused.To execute this function, the SystemDebtEngine must have enough stablecoin, which typically comes from the protocol's surplus.A successful execution of this function removes the bad debt from the system.

params._value: The amount of bad debt to be settled.

whitelist(address).details: Grants an allowance to the `toBeWhitelistedAddress` to adjust the position address of the caller.Emits no events.

params.toBeWhitelistedAddress: The address that is granted permission to adjust the position address of the caller.

positionWhitelist.details: This is the mapping which stores the consent or allowance to adjust positions by the position addresses.The position address -> The allowance delegate address -> true (1) means allowed or false (0) means not allowed

accrueStabilityFee(bytes32,address,int25.notice: Accrue stability fee for a specific collateral pool.

addCollateral(bytes32,address,int256).notice: This function can only be called by the Adapter role when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.

adjustPosition(bytes32,address,address,a.notice: Adjusts the collateral and debt of a position in a specific collateral pool.

blacklist(address).notice: This function can only be called when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.

confiscatePosition(bytes32,address,addre.notice: Confiscates a position for liquidation. It seizes collateral and marks a debt.

moveCollateral(bytes32,address,address,u.notice: Moves collateral tokens from one address (often a position address) to another in a specified collateral pool.

movePosition(bytes32,address,address,int.notice: Moves collateral and debt from one position to another in a specific collateral pool.

moveStablecoin(address,address,uint256).notice: Moves stablecoin from one address to another.

settleSystemBadDebt(uint256).notice: Settles the system's bad debt of the caller.

whitelist(address).notice: This function can only be called when the BookKeeper contract is not paused.

userdoc.notice: A contract which acts as a bookkeeper of the Fathom Stablecoin protocol. It has the ability to move collateral tokens and stablecoins within the accounting state variable.
